next.title: TD Ameritrade said it was restricting trading for GameStop, AMC and others amid a triple-digit percentage surge in the value of those companies in recent days. $GME $AMC https://t.co/rT1NDaqncT https://t.co/Oo402DMexE

localize.full_text: TD Ameritrade表示，由于GameStop、AMC等公司的价值在最近几天出现了三位数的百分比激增，因此限制了这些公司的交易。$GME $AMC https://t.co/rT1NDaqncT
TD Ameritrade表示，由於GameStop、AMC等公司的價值在最近幾天出現了三位數的百分比激增，因此限制了這些公司的交易。$GME $AMC https://t.co/rT1NDaqncT
